title: Why the average tax refund exceeds $3,400 this tax season and drivers will only go so far out of their way to find cheaper gas
text:
King of crowns: Wisconsin dentist convicted of breaking patients' teeth to submit $4.2 million in bogus insurance claims

Dr. Scott Charmoli was charged with selling patients unnecessary crown procedures and then cracking their teeth with a drill to justify insurance claims. Read More

Time is money: Drivers will only go so far out of their way to find cheaper gas

A gallon of gas was $4.32 according to Monday averages from AAA. Read More

Just when Americans could use some extra cash, the average tax refund exceeds $3,400 this tax season — here's why

The average refund so far is nearly 14% higher than a similar point last year. Read More

March Madness bracket tips: Avoid these four mistakes

If you filled out your bracket and had No. 8 Boise State taking down No. 1 Gonzaga in round 2, you might want to reconsider, according to one expert. Read More

‘Why I am leaving Goldman Sachs': On the 10th anniversary of his scathing resignation, Greg Smith says he has found the problem he wants to solve

Smith is still proud of his famous March 2012 New York Times op-ed, in which he described Goldman's environment as “toxic and destructive.” Read More

VW's new electric microbus is retro outside, modern inside. When can you get one?

The obvious successor to the famous VW bus of surfboards, curtained windows and peace signs, this version will likely be the first all-electric minivan to reach U.S. showrooms. Read More

From Harriet Tubman's farm to the home base of the suffragist movement, discover places across America keeping women's history alive. Read More

If you bought an electric car or purchased a renewable energy system, it pays to know the details if you want the tax benefits. Read More

If you feel like you're bleeding money at the pump, these apps can help you find cheaper gas, use less gas, and get cash back for it. Read More
